name: configtxlator.js
description: Hyperledger Fabric's configtxlator implemented in js as a library to use with fabric-sdk-node

scripts.build: tsc; cp src/bundle.d.ts dist; cp src/bundle.js dist
scripts.update:pbjs: project_path=$PWD; cd ./fabprotos; pbjs -t static-module -p google-protos -p protos $(find . -name "*.proto" -type f) -o $project_path/src/bundle.js
scripts.update:pbts: project_path=$PWD; cd ./fabprotos; pbjs -t static-module -p google-protos -p protos $(find . -name "*.proto" -type f) | pbts -o $project_path/src/bundle.d.ts -

author: Manoel Vieira
